item.title: Weekly Review #02 - Work, Anxiety and Growth
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface It’s been a full year since I started working in Beijing after my internship. I’ve always been a person with an inexplicable sense of ritual. At this juncture, I frequently reflect on my thoughts, gains, anxieties, and regrets from this past year. I often wonder, on this day a year ago, what would that nervous yet expectant version of myself have hoped to gain from the year ahead?
